description: Try our easy to follow Salmon, Leek & Pea Pie With Dill Mash recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salmon, Leek & Pea Pie With Dill Mash
name: Salmon, Leek & Pea Pie With Dill Mash Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 kg cartons readymade fresh mashed potato

recipeInstructions.text: Add the leeks and peas to the sauce, then gently stir in the salmon. Transfer to a large gratin dish. Place the mashed potato in a large bowl and beat with 2 tablespoons water and twothirds of the dill until soft and smooth. Spoon over the salmon mixture and scatter over the Parmesan. Place in a preheated oven, 200°C for 10 minutes, then transfer to a preheated high grill and cook for 5 minutes until the top is browned. Scatter with the remaining dill.
